title: Getting Started
content:
The main aim of this facade consist in using the basic environment describe in OpenAI Gym.
Currently, there is no interesting in creating environment Scala side. The workflow idea is:
 develop your reinforcement learning in Scala, create a functional facade to interact with ScalaPy Gym test your algorithms in Open AI baselines and share your results!

title: Welcome to the documentation
content:
ScalaPy gym aim at using Open AI gym in Scala!
Getting Started
